title: i have a google pixel 128gb variant i recently update it to android 9.0 its keep restarting
content: i recently updated my google pixel to android 9.0 after update it keep restarting i cant use my phone also i tired factory resetting then i tried the safe mode still its keep restarting.I google also about the issue so there were many facing this issue i think.So please tell me solution to it.
